pages.text: The Ritual of Aura will be buffed by valuable blocks below it, often increasing the AOE cap or source discount. Finally, a beacon can be placed above the ritual brazier to further increase the range of the effects.

The base blocks that can amplify the ritual are: $(br)Diamond: increase total AOE and source discount. $(br)Gold: increase AOE cap and slight source discount. $(br)Netherite: greatly increase AOE cap, some AOE boost, and a massive source discount. $(br)Gorgon stone: increases source cost and AOE boost, but increases the AOE cap by an incredible amount! Not for the faint of heart.
